data.name: Intruder on the bridge - Dalia
data.detailed_description:
Intruder on the bridge - Dalia tells the story of Dalia Gray and her conflicted relationship with Captain Roger Dyce. The events narrated take place before the events of "intruder on the bridge". This DLC contains around 350 new images and some new video sequences. During the dialogues the player will be able to change some details of the story.
The player will be able to unlock 10 new achievements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Intruder on the bridge - Dalia 
contains explicit and animated consensual sex scenes, in general this game contains adult themes that are not suitable for all ages and all sensibilities, specifically the game contains themes that include nudity, strong language, alcohol and drugs use sex and violence.
